Query.Sentence: SELECT COUNT(b.bk_id) as "plazasOcupadas" FROM ${mainschema}.booking b join ${mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id=bd.bk_id #WHERE#

WITH temp_table AS( SELECT booking.bk_id, booking.bk_usr_id, booking.bk_cw_id, booking.bk_state, coworking.cw_id, coworking.cw_name, coworking.cw_lat, coworking.cw_lon, booking_rate.bkr_ratio, ARRAY_AGG (date ORDER BY date ASC) AS dates FROM ${mainschema}.booking JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_date ON booking.bk_id = booking_date.bk_id JOIN ${mainschema}.coworking ON booking.bk_cw_id = coworking.cw_id LEFT JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_rate ON booking.bk_id = booking_rate.id_bkr GROUP BY booking.bk_id,coworking.cw_id, coworking.cw_name,booking_rate.bkr_ratio, coworking.cw_lat, coworking.cw_lon ORDER BY dates DESC) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM temp_table #WHERE#
SELECT count(bd.bk_id) as "dates" FROM {mainschema}.booking b join {mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id = bd.bk_id #WHERE#

SELECT c.cw_name as cw_name, b.bk_id as bk_id, b.bk_state as bk_state FROM ${mainschema}.coworking c JOIN ${mainschema}.booking b on c.cw_id = b.bk_cw_id JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id = bd.bk_id WHERE b.bk_state = true and bd.date >= current_date #WHERE_CONCAT#

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM public.booking_date.date) as y FROM public.booking INNER JOIN public.booking_date on public.booking_date.bk_id = public.booking.bk_id #WHERE# GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR from public.booking_date.date), public.booking.bk_state ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR from public.booking_date.date);
